name: ecms_p12_epg_aggregator
description: setup: npm install -g tsd; tsd install mocha should --save; install jshint plugin in vscode;

scripts.vscdebug: logLevel=debug apiclient=${npm_config_apiclient} apisecret=${npm_config_apisecret} apihost=${npm_config_apihost} DB=${npm_config_DB} node --nolazy --inspect-brk=9229 --trace-warnings ./app/main.js
scripts.debug: logLevel=debug apiclient=${npm_config_apiclient} apisecret=${npm_config_apisecret} apihost=${npm_config_apihost} DB=${npm_config_DB} node --nolazy --trace-warnings ./app/main.js
scripts.debug:int: logLevel=debug apiclient=${npm_config_intapiclient} apisecret=${npm_config_intapisecret} apihost=${npm_config_intapihost} DB=${npm_config_DB} node --nolazy --trace-warnings ./app/main.js
scripts.debug:s3: logLevel=verb apiclient=${npm_config_intapiclient} apisecret=${npm_config_intapisecret} apihost=${npm_config_intapihost} DB=${npm_config_DBS3} node --nolazy --trace-warnings ./app/main.js
